title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Development Project for Early Childhood Programming Robot Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and experience in robot manipulation
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Design at least three early childhood programming robot education scenarios combining pedagogical play, guided play, and free play strategies
Develop age-specific activity plans using robotics education tools (e.g., educational robot kits, block coding programs)
Analyze the effectiveness of developed instructional designs through project-based assessment and suggest improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
